item.title: HelloWorld
item.description: So we just started our own blog where we will post all sort of cool security related articles. What is sharkzwithlazers you might ask? We are a bunch of security enthusiasts comming from different fields of the IT community. Together we play CTF´s and other security challenges. Curious? Join us on our TS3 at sharkzwithlazers.pizza
item.content:
So we just started our own blog where we will post all sort of cool security related articles.

What is sharkzwithlazers you might ask?

We are a bunch of security enthusiasts comming from different fields of the IT community. Together we play CTF´s and other security challenges.
Curious? Join us on our TS3 at sharkzwithlazers.pizza
